attributes.action: Open up churches completely for preaching and worship.
attributes.additional_details: The churches collectively can work with social distancing measures like gyms and pubs to ensure that the spread of the virus would not take place. Please open our churches immediately as the mental health of many people will be helped by this measure taken.
attributes.background: I want the churches to be opened up fully. As they're as healthy as gyms are to the well being and mental health's of the communities while facing Covid-19. If Gyms open then so must churches for certain. We are all about the health and well being of humanity whhi have being facing depression too.

rejection.details:
Churches have been allowed to open since 4 July, so we're not sure what else you'd like the UK Parliament or Government to do. 

You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-guidance-for-the-safe-use-of-places-of-worship-during-the-pandemic-from-4-july/covid-19-guidance-for-the-safe-use-of-places-of-worship-during-the-pandemic-from-4-july

Whether a place of worship opens is a decision for those managing the premises, not the UK Parliament or Government. You could start a new petition calling for specific changes to the Government guidance on safe reopening. 

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
